data.title: Sao Tome and Principe
data.text:
São Tomé and Príncipe and been a member of the ILO since 1982. In partnership with the government, employers' organisations and workers' organisations, the International Labour Organisation works to promote an environment conducive to the creation of decent jobs for young men and women, including people with disabilities, in urban and rural areas, and to strengthen and extend social protection for all.

For more information and resources, please visit the French page.
